code: import React from'react';import classes from'./Order.module.css';var order=function order(props){var ingredients=[];for(var ingredientName in props.ingredients){ingredients.push({name:ingredientName,amount:props.ingredients[ingredientName]});}var ingredientOutput=ingredients.map(function(ig){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{style:{textTransform:'capitalize',display:'inline-block',margin:'0 8px',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'5px'},key:ig.name},ig.name,"(",ig.amount,")");});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classes.Order},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Ingredients:",ingredientOutput),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Price:",/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,"INR ",Number.parseFloat(props.price).toFixed(2))));};export default order;
